newsitem.title: ESTONIA: TALLINN WATER TO ISSUE NEW CPS, OTHERS TO FOLLOW.
newsitem.headline: TALLINN WATER TO ISSUE NEW CPS, OTHERS TO FOLLOW.

text.p: The Tallinn Water and Sewage company is to launch a new issue of commercial paper worth 40 million kroons on April 8, Hansapank said on Tuesday.

This month also Hansa Liising, Tallinna Sadam (Tallin Port), Tallinna Soojus (Tallinn Heating) and Eesti Mobiiltelefon (EMT) will probably launch new CP issues, Hansapank's interest rate products manager Ulo Kallas told Reuters.
He said that EMT might raise its issue from its present 20 million kroons to 70 million kroons.
The yield of the three-year Tallinn Water paper is an annual 8.92 percent, Kallas said.
The water company may also launch another issue in April, Kallas added.
